"Paradigm Matrix":
"Players who are ventuing through the paradigm matrix will
encounter a variety of scenarios.

Goals or objectives for Paradigm completion can be done
by defeating enemies, collecting item drops and talking to characters.

Once you have cleared the objective or reached the goal.
A new continuity will open up on the matrix allowing you to
advance through the story. You may continue with this any time you would like.
"

"The paradigm matrix will gradually unlock as you return to the
ARKS ship after completing a paradigm.

Aim to complete the breakthrough paradigms that are lit up
on the paradigm matrix."
